text:
In [[Fairhaven]]'s [[Wood Ward]], at the base of an [[airship]] tower near the city's center, stands the huge bazaar known as the Distant Exchange. Local law decrees that nothing native
to [[Aundair]] can be sold within the Distant Exchange.
People visit here to purchase foreign goods and
rarities, as well as to meet unusual folk.

Close to the embassies near [[Fairhold]] and several bustling districts, the Distant Exchange is also a trading place for information. More than one merchant is loyal to a foreign interest, and agents can talk within the exchange under the guise of doing business.
title: Distant Exchange
